game.name: Towerbolt
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Towerbolt is a fast paced vertical platformer set in the year 239X. Race to the top of a cyberpunk Megatower while outrunning lethal security lasers on every floor!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Towerbolt is a fast paced vertical platformer set in the year 239X. Race to the top of a cyberpunk Megatower while outrunning lethal security lasers on every floor!
